data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Novatsi.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Novatsi, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Novatsi, North Macedonia by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of Novatsi against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Novatsi, North Macedonia. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Albanian, Macedonian people.
Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Novatsi, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 2 believers in Novatsi, North Macedonia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Novatsi to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
